did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Letter written to the editor of a newspaper, Major Harper, by Maria S. encouraging ladies of Raymond and vicinity to contribute to efforts to sew undergarments, stockings, and mattresses for soldiers serving in the Civil War. Also includes coversheet which has West Point April 20, 1863 written on it.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: [Civil War Letter, 1863], Ms2009-021, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The [Civil War Letter, 1863] was purchased for the Civil War collection in Special Collections in 1994.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement and description of the [Civil War Letter, 1863] was completed in February 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: There is no information available about the author or recipient of this letter.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of a single letter written by Maria S. to Major Harper requesting the use of his newspaper to encourage ladies to support the men serving in the Civil War. Maria S. requests the use of the newspaper to ask for volunteers to sew or make things like undergarments, stockings and mattresses. Also included is a cover sheet which says West Point April 20, 1863 but there is no indication that this is related to the actual letter.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
